    • Method Detail

      • parseUpdate

        Update parseUpdate(org.antlr.runtime.ANTLRReaderStream stream)
                   throws ParserException
        Parses an update from a given stream. Expects an ANTLR reader stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - An ANTLR reader stream.
        Returns:
        Update The Update obtained by parsing the stream input.
        Throws:
        ParserException - If parsing failed for some reason; use getErrors() to get all errors.

      • parseProgram

        java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseFormula> parseProgram(org.antlr.runtime.ANTLRReaderStream stream)
                                                  throws ParserException
        Parses the KR specific content of various GOAL program components from a given stream. Expects an ANTLR reader stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - An ANTLR reader stream
        Returns:
        A list of DatabaseFormulas.
        Throws:
        ParserException - If parsing failed for some reason; use getErrors() to get all errors.

      • getErrors

        java.util.List<ParserException> getErrors()
        Returns:
        The list of all errors that occurred while parsing.
